title: How do I fix my connection issues? My Pixel 3 XL keeps dropping 4gLTE connections. Stuck in 3G Hell.
content:
Pixel 3 XL continuously dropping the LTE connection. I've changed SIM cards to try and fix it as well as resetting all the network configurations as described by sprint. These issues didn't start occurring until 
~February 2019 - I've had the phone since it's release and it has worked beautifully until Feb..
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
